title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Endgame; Eagles Draft Room Drama; Draft Value Reality; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Endgame; Eagles Draft Room Drama; Draft Value Reality; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John looks at the reality of the Aaron Rodgers/Packers standoff and the likely anti-climactic endgame. He also explains why the viral video of disagreement in the Eagles war room is being blown out of proportion, the reality about internal draft board debates, and why the media's opinion about late round draft value is irrelevant. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
